mapper.select: SELECT work_experience_id, employee_id, company_name, position, department, job_description, start_date, end_date, salary_range, sort_order, remark, create_time, update_time FROM t_employee_work_experience WHERE employee_id = #{employeeId} AND deleted_flag = 0 ORDER BY sort_order ASC, start_date DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE t_employee_work_experience SET deleted_flag = 1, update_time = NOW() WHERE employee_id = #{employeeId} AND deleted_flag = 0
